Computer.name: LunaSec Drop
Computer.file:
Ocassionaly we will upload files here, so you should come back often to check if there's something new! We're not the "there's new stuff in the drop server check em" type, so you'll gotta know when to come back ;)
-Pauline

Me and Kaisa found some weird files hidden in some nodes, I wonder what they could do cuz I tried to open them with like a lot of executables and nothing works :s, We'll keep them anyway just in case.
